blockr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    blockr

    Building blocks for data manipulation and visualization operations.

    Installation

    You can install the development version of blockr from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cynkra/blockr")

    Example

    A simple stack of blocks providing a dataset selector and a filter operation.

    library(blockr)

stack <- new_stack(
  data_block,
  filter_block
)

serve_stack(stack)
